issue.title: [C++] Upgrade to flatbuffers 1.6.0
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-606](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-606). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-606?focusedCommentId=15904743) by Julien Lafaye (jlafaye):*
Hello,

If that is ok, I would be happy to help on this. I worked on something similar in the Parquet project (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/PARQUET-849). I think it would be a good start to get acquainted with the Arrow codebase.

What do you think ?

Regards

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-606?focusedCommentId=15906415) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Please be my guest

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-606?focusedCommentId=15906505) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 373
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/373>
